description: The department has a requirement to establish NMSO for the supply and delivery of commercial and militarized diesel generator sets and their accessories, as well as for the provision of training and support for the engine controllers, transfer switches, networking systems and generating units delivered as required.

full_summary:
# Diesel Generator Sets National Master Standing Offers (NMSO)

## Introduction
Canada is seeking proposals for the establishment of National Master Standing Offers (NMSO) for the supply and delivery of commercial and militarized diesel generator sets, accessories, and training services.

## Background
This requirement is open to all entities interested in supplying diesel generator sets, including accessories and operators training to federal government departments and authorized users.

## Key Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3787504297
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3787504297
* **Publication Date**: August 19, 2023
* **Closing Date**: September 27, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Ongoing
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and others
* **Regions of Opportunity**: All provinces and territories in Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Saskatchewan, Yukon, Prince Edward Island, British Columbia, Nova Scotia, Quebec (except NCR), Manitoba, New Brunswick, Northwest Territories, National Capital Region (NCR), Ontario (except NCR), and Newfoundland and Labrador

## Contact Information

* For more information about this opportunity, please contact Sean Brazeau, Procurement Specialist at [sean.brazeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sean.brazeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

## Additional Resources
The solicitation package can be found on the Ariba Discovery website: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17208321?extsite=MTcyMDgzMjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17208321?extsite=MTcyMDgzMjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

Note the following:
